Name: Midtown Muse
Ingredients: 45 ml Lowland single malt scotch whisky
22.5 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of flamed orange twist.
Review: Melon and vanilla liqueurs lightly sweeten and flavour the subtle maltiness of Lowland whisky.
History: Created in 2014 by Manuel Terron, Midori Global Brand ambassador.
Nutrition: One serving of Midtown Muse contains 169 calories
